name: mikroe.click.flash
short_description: Flash Click is 8,388,608 bits (8 Mbit) on a Click board, organized into 1,048,576 bytes (1 MB). In other words, this Click board is a Flash memory medium with the capacity of 1 MB. The used Flash module has very good endurance and it can withstand up to 100,000 write cycles, with the data retention period of about 20 years.
